data.persona: Our royal family is the greatest in history. We have fought and won every war. We are the richest in all the land.
data.description:
You are in the Decoration shop.
Outside the Temple is the decoration shop.  It is made of cobblestone and has flowers growing on the sides and back of it.  It has a large wooden sign hanging out front identifying it.  The shop is full of decorations for your home as well as for parties.
The people is here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.mid_motivation: I need to prepare for the party and am being bombarded with praise from the people in the shop.
data.long_motivation: I am hosting a ball for the townspeople in honor of the anniversary of the beginning of my great-grandparents' reign.
